Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Anders Henja. Author.
    vol2birdR package author and author of RAVE and HLHDF libraries

  • Adriaan M. Dokter. Author, maintainer.

  • Alexander Tedeschi. Contributor.

  • Tsung-Yu Lin. Contributor.
    contributor MistNet segmentation model

  • Subranshu Maji. Contributor.
    contributor MistNet segmentation model

  • Daniel Sheldon. Contributor.
    contributor MistNet segmentation model

  • Bart Kranstauber. Contributor.

  • Jurriaan H. Spaaks. Contributor.
    contributor to vol2bird library

  • Lourens Veen. Contributor.
    contributor to vol2bird library

  • Iwan Holleman. Contributor.
    contributor to vol2bird library

  • Hidde Leijnse. Contributor.
    contributor to vol2bird library

  • John H. Merritt. Contributor, copyright holder.
    author of RSL library

  • Bart Kelley. Contributor.
    contributor and maintainer of RSL library

  • Mark Couture. Contributor.
    author of iris2odim add-on to RAVE library

  • Daniel Falbel. Contributor.
    contributor of original idea for building with torch support

  • Swedish Meteorological and Hydrological Institute, SMHI. Copyright holder.
    copyright holder of HLHDF and RAVE libraries

  • GloBAM. Funder.
    https://globam.science

Citation

Source: DESCRIPTION
